io.tarantool.driver.core

Class AbstractTarantoolConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tarantool.driver.core.AbstractTarantoolConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TarantoolConnectionManager, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TarantoolClusterConnectionManager, TarantoolSingleConnectionManager

    public abstract class AbstractTarantoolConnectionManager
extends Object
implements TarantoolConnectionManager
    Contains basic connection establishing and selection strategy invocation algorithms. Subclasses must implement the retrieving of Tarantool server addresses.

    • Method Detail

      • getAddresses

        protected abstract Collection<TarantoolServerAddress> getAddresses()
        Get server addresses to connect to. They must belong to one cluster and contain the information necessary for the internal ConnectionSelectionStrategy instance.
        Returns:
        Tarantool server addresses

      • getConnection

        public TarantoolConnection getConnection()
        Description copied from interface: TarantoolConnectionManager
        Get an established connection according to the order provided by specified connection selection strategy. If the connection procedure hasn't been performed yet, starts it.
        Specified by:
        getConnection in interface TarantoolConnectionManager
        Returns:
        next connection in order

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
